command: Create a new tool in packages/core/src/tools/code-complete.ts to provide code completion suggestions for Python files using Gemini API
Add a /complete command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to trigger code completion for the current file
Create a tool in packages/core/src/tools/lint-python.ts to run pylint on Python files and summarize issues
Add a /lint command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to lint Python files in the current directory
Create a tool in packages/core/src/tools/test-generate.ts to generate unit tests for Python functions using unittest
Add a /test-gen command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to create unit tests for Python files
Write a script in /sdcard/scripts/format-python.sh to format Python files using black
Add a /format command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to format Python files with black
Create a tool in packages/core/src/tools/debug-log.ts to insert debug print statements in Python functions
Add a /debug command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to add debug logs to Python files
Create a tool in packages/core/src/tools/refactor-python.ts to refactor Python code to use type hints
Add a /type-hint command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to add type hints to Python files
Write a script in /sdcard/scripts/run-tests.sh to run all Python unit tests with pytest
Add a /test-run command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to execute pytest on Python tests

Add a /docstring command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to add docstrings to Python files

Add a /explain command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to explain code in the current file

Add a /template command in packages/cli/src/gemini.tsx to create Python class boilerplate
